alert.note: Alert for Runnels (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 11:27PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Runnels County through 1230 AM CDT... At 1127 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wingate, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Winters, Hatchel, Crews, Benoit, Wingate, Drasco, Pumphrey, Wilmeth and Lake Winters Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
